official_title: A bill entitled: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1982.
short_title: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1982

summary.text: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1982 - Establishes the position of "airways facilities systems specialist" within the Airways Facilities Division of the Federal Aviation Administration, Department of Transportation. Sets forth wage classifications, retirement plans, and a career progression program for such systems specialists.
